<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[118, 341, 382, 355]]<|/det|>
Determine the rank of the matrix

\[
\mathbf{A}=\left(\begin{array}{llll}
1 & -1 & -1 & 1 \\
2 & -1 & -4 & 3 \\
3 & -3 & -2 & 2 \\

\end{array}\right) .
\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[892, 388, 917, 405]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[118, 454, 222, 467]]<|/det|>
Show that if

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[351, 466, 646, 538]]<|/det|>
\[
\mathbf{A x}=p\left(\begin{array}{l}
1 \\
2 \\
3 \\
5
\end{array}\right)+q\left(\begin{array}{l}
-1 \\
-1 \\
-3 \\
-4
\end{array}\right)+r\left(\begin{array}{l}
-1 \\
-4 \\
-2 \\
-6
\end{array}\right)
\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[118, 542, 484, 557]]<|/det|>
where \(p, q\) and \(r\) are given real numbers, then

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[436, 564, 562, 633]]<|/det|>
\[
\mathbf{x}=\left(\begin{array}{c}
p+\lambda \\
q+\lambda \\
r+\lambda \\
\lambda
\end{array}\right),
\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[118, 642, 246, 657]]<|/det|>
where \(\lambda\) is real.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[118, 673, 424, 690]]<|/det|>

p\left(\begin{array}{l}
1 \\
2 \\
3 \\
5
\end{array}\right)+q\left(\begin{array}{l}
-1 \\
-1 \\
-3 \\
-4
\end{array}\right)+r\left(\begin{array}{l}
-1 \\
-4 \\
-2 \\
-6
\end{array}\right)=\left(\begin{array}{r}
3 \\
7 \\
8 \\
15
\end{array}\right) .
\]
